title: TypeCon Registration is Now Open!
content:
—

TypeCon2006 Update - June 22, 2006 - TypeCon Registration is Now Open!

TypeCon2006: The Boston T Party  
August 9-13, 2006  
Hyatt Regency Boston  
Boston, Massachusetts USA

presented by The Society of Typographic Aficionados (SOTA)  
in partnership with Massart and the Museum of Printing

————————————————————————————————-  
JOIN US IN BOSTON FOR THE TASTIEST TYPECON EVER!  
————————————————————————————————-  
TypeCon2006: The Boston T Party is the ultimate event for anyone who  
works with type or loves letters. The eighth annual TypeCon plays  
host to a delicious mix of legends and innovators from Beantown and  
beyond, including David Berlow, Mourad Boutros, Matthew Carter, James  
Craig, Dave Farey, Sibylle Hagmann, Kit Hinrichs, Akira Kobayashi,  
Kent Lew, Thomas Phinney, Paul Shaw, Nancy Skolos and Tom Wedell,  
Clif Stoltze, Ilene Strizver, Adam Twardoch, and Robin Williams.

The TypeCon2006 program will explore Boston’s rich printing history  
and contemporary culture, type in motion, experimental lettering,  
typography for gaming and mobile devices, and much more. Hands-on  
workshops range from digital font production and expert typography  
techniques to calligraphy and letterpress printing. Special events  
include a type and design education forum, the Typophile Film  
Festival, tours of Boston’s typographic hot spots, and the opening of  
the TypeGallery, SOTA’s international exhibition of new type and  
design.

TypeCon2006 offers five days of education and entertainment in an  
intimate, friendly setting. Conference registration fees start at  
just $120, making TypeCon2006 the most affordable event of its kind.  
Secure registration will be available on the TypeCon2006 website  
shortly! Make plans to attend TypeCon2006 - it’s an event created  
especially for you!

TypeCon2006: [http://www.typecon.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20060704235642/http:/www.typecon.com/)

————————————————————————————————-  
EARLY BIRD REGISTRATION IS NOW AVAILABLE! DON’T MISS THIS CHANCE TO SAVE BIG!  
————————————————————————————————-  
SOTA is committed to bringing you a high-quality and affordable  
conference. Conference registration and workshop fees are the lowest  
you’ll find at an event of this quality in North America. Early-bird  
discounts are offered to all attendees registering by June 30. Join  
SOTA while you register for the conference, and receive an extra  
discount!

Early registration (through June 30)  
SOTA members: $195 professionals/$120 students  
Non-members: $235 professionals/$140 students

Regular registration (July 1-July 27)  
SOTA members: $225 professionals/$135 students  
Non-members: $265 pro/$160 students

Late/walk-up registration (after July 27)  
SOTA members: $295 professionals/$175 students  
Non-members: $345 pro/$200 students

Optional pre-conference workshops are $50 for each half-day session  
and $100 for each full-day session, plus materials/lab fees, if any.

Secure registration is now available on the TypeCon2006 website!  
Seating is limited - register today to book your spot!

TypeCon2006: [http://www.typecon.com/typecon2006\_register.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20060704235642/http:/www.typecon.com/typecon2006_register.htm)

————————————————————————————————-  
NOW BOOKING - TYPECON2006 HOTEL AND HEADQUARTERS - HYATT REGENCY BOSTON  
————————————————————————————————-  
The TypeCon2006 conference hotel and headquarters is the Hyatt  
Regency Boston. The center of activity for TypeCon2006, the Hyatt was  
recently updated with contemporary furnishings and plush, incredibly  
comfortable Grand beds. The Boston Common, theatre district,  
Chinatown, shopping, and other attractions are just around the  
corner. The “T,” Boston’s efficient mass transit system, runs  
underneath the Hyatt (Downtown Crossing stop). The hotel offers both  
wired and wireless high-speed internet access, amazing views, and a  
friendly staff. The Hyatt features top-notch restaurants and a  
spacious but cozy lounge area, heated indoor pool, sauna,  
state-of-the-art fitness center, and many other amenities.

We have negotiated a discounted room rate for TypeCon2006 attendees  
at the Hyatt Regency Boston. Your special attendee rate is $169 (plus  
tax) per night for single and double rooms. This is a great rate at a  
wonderful hotel, and rooms are going fast. Book yours today!

PLEASE NOTE: This discounted rate is only available until we fill our  
room block or July 10, 2006, whichever comes first. We always sell  
out our room blocks, so please don’t wait until the last minute to  
make your reservation.

[https://resweb.passkey.com/Resweb.do?mode=welcome\_ei\_new&eventID=25804](http://web.archive.org/web/20060704235642/https:/resweb.passkey.com/Resweb.do?mode=welcome_ei_new&eventID=25804)

————————————————————————————————-

support of type design, typography, and the related arts. For more

 [http://www.typesociety.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20060704235642/http:/www.typesociety.org/).

Have questions, need answers? Send us an email!

Can’t wait to see you in Boston!
